name: Buckyball
description:
Year 2162. The homeless epidemic had risen to dangerous levels. Designers like us chose to focus on their personal ambitions instead of aiding the poor. They are now taken to a mining facility on Europa against their will, separated from their loved ones, if there are any.

As you take a short break and walk around the camp, hallucinations will tell the story of your past and journey to this brutal place.

WASD - Mouse
